text: Skazhy: «YA znakhodzhu v odkrovenni, yake dano meni, tilʹky zaboronu vzhyvannya v yizhu mertvechyny, prolytoyi krovi y mʺyasa svyni — tse nechyste; a shche mʺyasa zaboronenykh tvaryn, zabytykh bez z·hadky imeni Allaha». A yakshcho khtosʹ buv zmushenyy [zʺyisty] tse nenavmysno y ne porushuyuchy mezh, to Allah — Proshchayuchyy, Myloserdnyy
